moveGuildList.helpText: This will Move the Guild Info List higher on the bar on the right

moveOnlineAlliesList.helpText: This will Move the Online Allies List higher on the bar on the right

enableOnlineAlliesWidgets.helpText: Enabling this option will enable the Allies List Widgets (coloring on the Allies List panel)

moveFSBox.helpText: This will move the FS box to the left, under the menu, for better visibility (unless it is already hidden.)

moveDailyQuest.helpText: This will move the Daily Quest to the left, under the menu, for better visibility (unless it is already hidden.)

gameHelpLink.helpText: This turns the Game Help text in the lower right box into a link to this settings page.

enableTempleAlert.helpText: Puts an alert on the LHS if you have not prayed at the temple today.

enableUpgradeAlert.helpText: Puts an alert on the LHS if you have not upgraded your stamina with gold today.

enableComposingAlert.helpText: Puts an alert on the LHS if you have composing slots available.

enhanceOnlineDots.helpText: Enhances the green/grey dots by player names to show online/offline status.

hideBuffSelected.helpText: Hides the buff selected functionality in the online allies and guild info section.

hideHelperMenu.helpText: Hides the helper menu from top left.

keepHelperMenuOnScreen.helpText: Keeps helper menu on screen as you scroll (helper menu must be enabled to work). Also works with quick links.

showAdmin.helpText: Show ranking controls for guild managemenet in member profile page - this works for guild founders only

ajaxifyRankControls.helpText: Enables guild founders with ranking rights to change rank positions without a screen refresh.

detailedConflictInfo.helpText: Inserts detailed conflict information onto your guild's manage page. Currently displays the target guild as well as the current score.

showCombatLog.helpText: This will show the combat log for each automatic battle below the monster list.

enableCreatureColoring.helpText: Creatures will be colored according to their rarity. Champions will be colored green, Elites yellow and Super Elites red.

showCreatureInfo.helpText: This will show the information from the view creature link when you mouseover the link.

fsboxlog.helpText: This enables the functionality to keep a log of recent seen FS Box message.

keepBuffLog.helpText: This enables the functionality to keep a log of recently casted buffs

huntingMode.helpText: This disable menu and some visual features to speed up the calf.

hideNonPlayerGuildLogMessages.helpText: Any log messages not related to the current player will be dimmed (e.g. recall messages from guild store)

useNewGuildLog.helpText: This will replace the standard guild log with the helper version of the guild log.

enableLogColoring.helpText: Three logs will be colored if this is enabled, Guild Chat, Guild Log and Player Log. It will show any new messages in yellow and anything 20 minutes old ones in brown.

enableChatParsing.helpText: If this is checked, your character log will be parsed for chat messages and show the chat message on the screen if you reply to that message.

addAttackLinkToLog.helpText: If checked, this will add an Attack link to each message in your log.

enhanceChatTextEntry.helpText: If checked, this will enhance the entry field for entering chat text on the guild chat page.

showExtraLinks.helpText: If checked, this will add AH and UFSG links to equipment screens.

disableItemColoring.helpText: Disable the code that colors the item text based on the rarity of the item.

showQuickDropLinks.helpText: This will show a link beside each item which gives the option to drop the item.  WARNING: NO REFUNDS ON ERROR

storeLastQuestPage.helpText: This will store the page and sort order of each of the three quest selection pages for next time you visit. If you need to reset the links, turn this option off, click on the link you wish to reset and then turn this option back on again.

showNextQuestSteps.helpText: Shows all quest steps in the UFSG.

renderSelfBio.helpText: This determines if your own bio will render the FSH special bio tags.

renderOtherBios.helpText: This determines if other players bios will render the FSH special bio tags.

enableBioCompressor.helpText: This will compress long bios and provide a link to expand the compressed section.

showStatBonusTotal.helpText: This will show a total of the item stats when you mouseover an item on the profile screen.

enableQuickDrink.helpText: This enables the quick drink/wear functionality on the profile page.

disableDeactivatePrompts.helpText: This disables the prompts for deactivating buffs on the profile page.

enableAttackHelper.helpText: This will show extra information on the attack player screen about stats and buffs on you and your target

showPvPSummaryInLog.helpText: This will show a summary of the PvP results in the log.

autoFillMinBidPrice.helpText: This enables the functionality to automatically fill in the min bid price so you just have to hit bid and your bid will be placed.

hideRelicOffline.helpText: This hides the relic offline defenders checker.

enterForSendMessage.helpText: If enabled, will send a message from the Send Message screen if you press enter. You can still insert a new line by holding down shift when you press enter.

navigateToLogAfterMsg.helpText: If enabled, will navigate to the referring page after a successful message is sent. Example:  if you are on the world screen and hit message on the guild info panel after you send the message, it will return you to the world screen.

moveComposingButtons.helpText: If enabled, will move composing buttons to the top of the composing screen.

draggableHelperMenu.helpText: If enabled, allows the helper menu to be dragged around the screen.

draggableQuickLinks.helpText: If enabled, allows the quick link box to be dragged around the screen.

expandMenuOnKeyPress.helpText: If enabled, expands the left hand menu when you use hotkeys.

disableBreakdownPrompts.helpText:
If enabled, will disable prompts when you breakdown items.
NO REFUNDS OR DO-OVERS! Use at own risk.

collapseNewsArchive.helpText: If enabled, will collapse news archives.

collapseHallPosts.helpText: If enabled, will collapse hall posts.

hideSubLvlCreature.helpText: If enabled, will hide creatures that are lower than the current realm level.

hidePlayerActions.helpText: If enabled, will hide player actions.

disableQuickWearPrompts.helpText:
If enabled, will disable prompts when you Use/Ext items.
NO REFUNDS OR DO-OVERS! Use at own risk.
disableQuickWearPrompts.title:
Disable Use/Ext
Prompts

enableGuildActivityTracker.helpText: If enabled, will track guild member activity over time.
enableGuildActivityTracker.title: Enable Tracker

enableSeTracker.helpText:
If enabled, will track the last time each SE was killed.
This is DIFFERENT from the usual FSH network activity.
When this is enabled, if you have ANY game page open in a
browser tab it will scan the SE Log every 10 minutes.
You do not need auto-refresh for this to work.

showMonsterLog.helpText: This will show the creature log for each creature you see when you travel.

showTitanInfo.helpText: This will show titan info in the action list.

wantedGuildMembers.helpText: If enabled, will show guild members in the wanted bounty list.

highlightPvpProtection.helpText: If enabled, will put a red box around PvP Protection.

showBuffInfo.helpText: This will show buff info in the action list.
